history.proof: intros l xs ys H. induction H. - srun best use: app_nil_l, IR_equivalent_refl. - constructor. apply IHIR_equivalent. - apply IR_equiv_move. apply IHIR_equivalent. sfirstorder depth: 3. - sauto lq: on.

original: intros l xs ys H. induction H. - constructor. - constructor. apply IHIR_equivalent. - apply IR_equiv_move. apply IHIR_equivalent. - apply IR_equiv_trans with (l2 := ys ++ l); auto.
